about: I’m a CS × Biology (bioinformatics) undergrad student with a minor in data science and AI. I also lead a quantum research division at Charlotte AI research and am a Founder and President of a career ready club at UNCC called HAVK!

projects.title: GeneCrafter
projects.description: DNA → playful traits with short “why it works” notes.

projects.title: SYN
projects.description: Browser sign-language recognition (React + MediaPipe). 1st at UNCC Hackathon.

projects.title: QML Torch
projects.description: Hybrid quantum-classical ML framework (project lead at CAIR).

projects.title: BioForge
projects.description: Humanity vs pathogen evolution sim (3rd on Devpost 2025).

research.title: Cancer Genomics — The Jackson Laboratory
research.description: Building a resistance-prediction pipeline for EGFR-mutant cancers using OncoKB, COSMIC, and CIViC; integrating pathway mapping and mutation impact scoring.
research.progress: Model tuning (Python, Biopython); validating on curated cohorts.

research.title: QML Torch Research — CAIR Lab
research.description: Exploring hybrid quantum-classical models for small biological datasets; testing quantum kernels for classification.
research.progress: Preparing poster for undergraduate research symposium.

experience.summary: 700+ member hackathon org; ops, partnerships, mentorship.
